thread.section_title: WSJ. Magazine – Fashion, Travel, Design, Art, Culture, Food, Living
thread.title: WSJ. Magazine Editor’s Letter: Strike A Chord

author: Kristina O’Neill
title: WSJ. Magazine Editor’s Letter: Strike A Chord
text:
OUR MARCH MEN’S Style issue features people unapologetically true to their own natures, places where mind-clearing expansiveness is an everyday occurrence and, throughout, a spirit of indomitable individuality.
On our cover is a legend few readers will fail to recognize: Keith Richards, the charismatic guitarist and songwriter for the Rolling Stones. In our profile of the 74-year-old style icon, it’s clear that some things have hardly changed since the band debuted in 1962 (“Writing songs, you don’t get a minute off,” says...
